item.title: Cyber Security Threat Protection In the Cloud
item.description: In the past, castles relied on moats to provide extra security beyond their walls. This stopped attackers from directly reaching the castle. Similarly, today’s networks need more than just firewalls. Firewalls are effective but can be overwhelmed. Cloud-based security acts as a modern moat, providing a barrier outside the network. MegaPath’s Unified Threat Management (UTM) uses this approach, offering cloud, on-site, or hybrid security solutions. MegaPath’s UTM is a multi-layered Security as a Service (SaaS) solution that handles simple and complex threats, while also managing security alerts, logs, and compliance.
